section.name: $@NULL@$
section.summary: Welcome to the online course, Universal Design for Learning (UDL): Addressing Barriers.This course provides an overview of the UDL concept and principles. You can expect to complete this course in 5 to 6 hours to learn more about the framework and guidelines of UDL and how to apply them to the adult education context. You are asked to complete at least one of the assignments.
